TopicTitle: Astronaut Complex music without Kerbal chatter?

Articles.Content: So, is there ANY chance of getting the Astronaut Complex music WITHOUT Kerbals chatting in the background?> I think it's a brilliant piece of jazz, would love to listen to it on its own ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Is it one of these? [http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/most/kerbalspaceprogram.php](http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/most/kerbalspaceprogram.php)

Most of the soundtrack is royalty free music, I think only the main theme is specifically made for the game.
